007import javax.script.ScriptContext;
008import javax.script.ScriptException;
009
010import com.randomnoun.common.jessop.JessopExceptionConverter;
011
012public class JRubyExceptionConverter implements JessopExceptionConverter {
013
014        /* jruby doesn't return filenames or line numbers in the ScriptException object, 
015         * but these are contained in the jruby RaiseException object */
016    /* example stacktrace
017  NameError: undefined local variable or method `floob' for main:Object
018  <top> at test.jessop:6
019     */
020        @Override
021        public ScriptException toScriptException(ScriptContext scriptContext, Throwable t) {
022                if (t instanceof ScriptException) { 
023                        ScriptException se = (ScriptException) t;
024                        StackTraceElement[] stes = getFirstStackTrace(se.getCause());
025                        if (stes!=null && stes.length > 0) {
026                                return (ScriptException) new ScriptException(se.getMessage(), 
027                                        stes[0].getFileName(), stes[0].getLineNumber()).initCause(t);   
028                        }
029                }
030                return (ScriptException) new ScriptException(t.getMessage()).initCause(t);
031        }
032        
033        private StackTraceElement[] getFirstStackTrace(Throwable e) {
034                if (e instanceof org.jruby.exceptions.RaiseException) {
035                        return e.getStackTrace();
036                }
037                if (e.getCause()!=null) { return getFirstStackTrace(e.getCause()); }
038                // no RaiseException in stacktrace
039                return e.getStackTrace();
040        }
041
042}
